name: Settlement
description:
This game is developed for the 2019 Search for a Star Game Developement Competition.

All code was either in the base project provided, or has been developed by myself.

All visual and UI assets were downloaded from the Unity Asset Store or are default visuals from Unity. All downloaded assets are credited in my documentation, download available below.

To download the game, click the link below and then extract the zipped file.
